dagger.name: Dagger
dagger.description: Melee Weapon Attack: $sign($prof + $fine} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d4,$fine) piercing damage.

ssword.name: Shortsword
ssword.description: Melee Weapon Attack: $stat{$prof + $fine} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d6,$fine) piercing damage.

lsword.name: Longsword
lsword.description: Melee Weapon Attack: $stat{$prof + $str} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d8,$str) piercing damage, or $dmg(1d10,$str) if held with both hands.

mace.name: Mace
mace.description: Melee Weapon Attack: $stat{$prof + $str} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d6,$str) piercing damage.

sling.name: Sling
sling.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: $stat{$prof + $dex} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d4,$dex) piercing damage.

lxbow.name: Light Crossbow
lxbow.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: $stat{$prof + $dex} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d8,$dex) piercing damage.

hxbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
hxbow.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: $stat{$prof + $dex} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d10,$dex) piercing damage.

javelin.name: Javelin
javelin.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: $stat{$prof + $str} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: $dmg(1d6,$str) piercing damage.
